nodes.text: Herdringer was a male lieutenant of the Imperial Security Bureau during the early years of the Galactic Empire's reign. Stationed on the planet Lothal, he was killed by his fellow lieutenant, Jenkes, who had him pushed in front of a speeder bus. Three months after Herdringer's death, Jenkes pretended to be the lieutenant when dealing with the bounty hunter Bossk, although the hunter later discovered that Herdringer was dead and tricked Jenkes into admitting he had killed him.
Herdringer was first mentioned in Ezra's Gamble, a junior novel written by Ryder Windham and released in 2014.
